name: Goblet (Trichterpokal)
maker: Unknown maker, Façon de Venise, possibly the Glashütte of Sebastian Höchstetter
description: Goblet (Trichterpokal); Unknown maker, Façon de Venise, possibly the Glashütte of Sebastian Höchstetter (Austrian, active 1540 - 1569); Hall, Austria; about 1550 - 1560; Free- and mold-blown colorless (purplish-gray) glass with gilt applied decoration; 38.1 x 16.2 cm (15 x 6 3/8 in.); 84.DK.545; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
